title: Authorities, Labour Insurance and all Consultants‘ fees, Cost of the BOCW etc
clause_text: Authorities, Labour Insurance and all Consultants‘ fees, Cost of the BOCW etc. (4) (Deleted) (4) The cost of any movable items should not be considered for the calculation of cost of construction of amenity.
section: Construction Amenity TDR in Sq.m. = A / B * (2) 1.35 Where,
